Configuration.StudyNameEntrez: Primary ER-positive Breast Cancer Treated with Neoadjuvant Letrozole
Configuration.StudyNameReportPage: Primary ER-positive Breast Cancer Treated with Neoadjuvant Letrozole
Configuration.Description: These are tumor biopsies and corresponding normal samples from patients with early stage ER+/HER2- breast cancer who had received the aromatase inhibitor letrozole for 10-21 days prior to surgery.
Configuration.StudyInEx: All patients had early stage ER+/HER2- breast cancer and participated in a clinical trial of neoadjuvant letrozole for 10-21 days prior to surgery.

ParticipantSet.UseLimitation: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of this data is limited to health/biomedical/medical purposes. Use of this data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
